body: The ending is good I guess but at least make the MC good looking bruh and have a baddie next to him but still I'd give this 23/100 and I'm being generous

Fue el tipico final donde el amante termina teniendo una vida hecha a menos al perder su apariencia a consecuencia de todo lo que hizo.
El chico bueno logro superar todo y tener éxito en la vida. De la chica nada se sabe.
Hubiera preferido que el chico bueno no fuera tan humillado como siempre pasa donde el amante es mejor que el en todo y que al final se hubiera conseguido una chica mejor o unas de sus amigas para hacerle daño moral a la chica al ver que por lujuria perdio una relacion amorosa.
Al guapo que la chica lo haya dejado por algun negro con mas pene o un tipo con dinero o que su relacion haya fracasado por que fuera de la cama su relacion es superficial y tipos como el ella puede tener.

story 9/10 . In the end , the mc dated the fmc for aw while, but she continued cheating on him and the playboy showed him everything. After a time skip the playboy became a famous actor but his scandals and past were exposed and (he went to jail or something?). Either way his life is ruined and he was shown in a news all broken and looks dirty as hell. The MC overcame everything and became a famous director, he got married and the cheating girl was only a part of his memory and her whereabout were never mentioned.
He fucked up by saying he didn't like her. But it looks like they do hook up later but than she kept sleeping with the other guy
